rateLimit.notes: in milliseconds. Rate limiting to prevent API throttling. Conservative settings to avoid 429 errors. Orders are NOT affected by this (execute in parallel).

thresholds.notes: Liquidity thresholds: $50M minimum 24H combined volume, 0.15% maximum bid-ask spread, 0.5% maximum PERP-SPOT spread, 5% minimum funding APY (filters negative and low funding)

notes.description: Trading configuration for Hyperliquid spot and perp markets
notes.pairFormat: All pairs use PERP symbol naming convention
notes.spotMapping: Use symbolMapping.perpToSpot to get corresponding spot symbol
notes.orderSizes: Minimum order sizes per symbol defined in minOrderSizeUSD - positions will not open if insufficient capital
notes.leverage: Always uses 1x leverage (set per-pair before opening positions)
notes.bot: Bot behavior: minHoldTimeDays (minimum time before rebalancing, default 14), improvementFactor (required multiplier for switching positions, default 2x)
